task.title: Enable or Disable Time Notifications
task.shortdesc: Employee notification preferences can be enabled or disabled for the Time feature. These notifications include timesheet approvals, rejections, modifications, and notes.

context.note: Send notifications about modifications sparingly to avoid excessive employee notifications.

step.cmd: Select the Employee Preference tab, and then select Edit.
Select the delivery type for each notification. Available delivery types include Email, In Application, and both In Application and Email.
